name: Fibertite Warm Roof over DD400 checklist
visual inspection of substrate ready for SWP
Qa document recevied from main contractor
Substrate screwed down in every purlin line
Substrate has been cleaned and washed down
Surface is dry before installing Fillets
Substrate clean, dry, free of debris
VCL installed and covered all surface
VCL lapped with a minimum of 100mm laps
VCL clean, dry, free of derbris prior to install
Insulation board installed in a brick pattern
Boards tightly butted, and no gaps
Fixings as per fixing plan if no HDP board
Substrate dry & free of derbris prior to install
HDP installed as per fixing plan
Wipe and clean laps prior to welding
Probe of seam with QA hook
Probe of seam with QA hook
Fixings done according to specifications and details
Over flashings has a separation barrier
Fixings done according to specifications and details
All installation work completed, checked and reviewed as per specfications
